item.title: Trump says his visit to the Justice Department will be ‘historic’ after the president escaped two federal prosecutions by winning the election
item.description: The DOJ previously fired employees who served on Jack Smith's team, which charged Trump with plotting to overturn the 2020 election.

item.title: A former reality TV star just won the longest-ever Iditarod in Alaska after a grueling 10-day race
item.description: "It's a magical feeling," Jessie Holmes said.

item.title: The Education Department has suspended some income-driven student loan repayment plans. Here’s what borrowers should know
item.description: “It’s been wave after wave of bad news for student borrowers," said Aissa Canchola Bañez, policy director at the Student Borrower Protection Center.

item.title: Tesla may have no new car coming after all as report reveals plan to launch a stripped down Model Y
item.description: It looks increasingly likely that the much touted $25,000 entry level Tesla known colloquially as the Model 2 will not be built.

item.title: Volkswagen’s own-brand currywurst sausage proves almost as popular as its cars amid automotive sales decline
item.description: Volkswagen sold 8.55 million currywursts last year, almost equalling the 9 million cars sold across the group.
